creator: h.shibuya@vertexsystems.co.jp
text:
The error messages are: ------------------------------------------------------------------- [ERROR] Error in column-width property value '50%': org.apache.fop.fo.expr.PropertyException: No conversion defined [ERROR] Couldn't find hyphenation pattern ja [ERROR] Error building hyphenation tree for language ja ------------------------------------------------------------------- These appears infinitely. However, the same documents -- size -- less than 490KB -- carrying out (but as the amount of texts in tag '

' is only merely reduced ) -- these messages do not come out.

creator: j3322ptm@yahoo.de
text:
The error messages mean:
1. Percentage values are not supported for column width specifications.
 Use proportional-column-width() instead. If you are using docbook-xsl,
 upgrade to the most recent version.
2. Hyphenation is not supported for japanese. You have to turn off hyphenation.

Neiter of these has anything to do with the input size. Check
 http://xml.apache.org/fop/running.html#memory
on this matter.
Please do not use Bugzilla for random known problems. Search known issues,
or ask on the user list first.
